ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils

Class RosUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils.RosUtils

  • public class RosUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Here are utilities for simple launching and stopping (some) roscore and rqt utility, if available. -UtilsAutorun says whether to start anything from this -these situations can occur: -rqt and c++ roscore found, so they will be used -rqt and c++ roscore found, but jroscore is preffered: running jroscore+rqt -ROS installation not foud, running just jroscore
    See Also:
    ROS wiki, ROSjava documentation

      • autorun

      • utilsShallStart

        public static void utilsShallStart()
        By default, if any ROS node is launched, this is called and tries to launch ROS Core, RQT, TimeMaster and ParamServer. THese should be launched only once and terminated when the Nengo app exits.

      • setTimeMaster

        public static void setTimeMaster()
        sets the NengoROS as a time master (selected by default). Use these in python scripts.
